upload.server.description:
You can either run your sync server locally (if so, syncs will stop when your laptop is switched off), or on a server of your own.
  • To install the sync server locally, download the latest version (make sure to choose the proper installer for your system: Windows, Mac, Linux).
  • To deploy it manually on a server, follow these instructions.
upload.server.help: Enter {{url}} if your sync agent is running locally
upload.server.title: Setup sync server
upload.source.confirm-delete-description: If you delete this connector, all active uploads from this resource will be canceled. You cannot undo this action.
